case.state: Hey, thanks for inviting me! What game are we playing again?
Thanks for inviting me, ~player~. I'm Téa, by the way.
Sorry, did I keep you waiting?
Hey, what's up!?
The Dark Magician Girl?! But that's impossible!
Dark Magician Girl?! How did you get here?
Dark Magician Girl?! Am I just seeing things right now?
Dark Magician Girl?! It can't be!
Hey, are you sure you're old enough to be here?
Probably not a good idea to be wearing a school outfit in a place like this.
I dunno about a seminar, but you're up against a card game veteran, so you're in good hands!
What a view... To play a new card game on a scene like this? I've really lucked out now.
What a view... The gang back home will sure be jealous.
(May sure has a way with words. I hope I don't feel too bad when I beat her!)
Well then, Dark Magician Girl, let's have fun and duel!
It's not a hologram? Oh boy, what am I getting myself into?
Okay, she's real. But then, how did she know I'd be here...?
Chazz Princeton, was it? Yeah, I've heard all about you.
Chazz, here I come!
Hey, I know you! You're Hatsume Miku, from the famous dance game!
No way! Aren't you the Hatsume Miku?
(Oh hey, she's cute. Lots of energy too...)
You got it, May. It's time to duel!
Ok, this time I know I'm not seeing things, right?
Could you be a Butterspy? So I guess there are spirits in the cards...
Futaba, I can tell by your getup that you take gaming seriously. I hope you don't dissapoint!
Futaba, I can tell you're a gaming vet too! I guess I don't have to worry about this being easy!
Kyouko, huh? You seem like a fun opponent.
Brr... when did it get so cold outside?
Brr... and I thought it was cold in Noah's virtual world!
W-wait, is that a gun?
Ah! Keep that thing away from me!
Who activated Call of the Haunted?
Everyone ready? It's time to duel!
My perfect record is on the line. Let's do this!
I've always wanted to play other card games to see how I would do. Thanks for giving me this chance, ~player~
Good luck! You're gonna need it!
I don't plan to lose. Let's play!
I've always wanted to try new card games to see how I would do. Now let's duel!
Stripping or not, I hope you're know what you're in for by inviting me!
I only need one card this time.
I like this hand, except for this one card.
Just a little tune-up. One card
Not gonna settle. I'll take a card.
Just swap this one card, please.
Let's keep it going. I draw!
No swapping yet.
Let's wait and see...
Not worth the risk. I'll keep this hand!
Move along, dealer.
Graceful Charity lets me swap out three cards from the deck!
I'll play Graceful Charity! Three cards, dealer.
Three cards.
Hmm... I'll take three.
I couldn't have gotten a worse hand if I tried.
Full swap! I hope I don't regret it...
Take them all!
This is where my faith takes me! Swap five!
I activate Pot of Greed! It lets me draw two from the deck.
Pot of Greed! Two cards, please.
Can I get two, please?
Just two for now.
I like this card. I'll swap out the rest though.
At least there's one good card...
Yep, this hand needs work.
I'll swap these four. Show me what you've got!
For my next move, I'll take ~cards.text~ ~cards.ifplural(cards|card)~.
Hmm... how about ~cards.text~ ~cards.ifplural(cards|card)~?
Based on my hand, I better trade ~cards.text~ ~cards.ifplural(cards|card)~.
I'll tribute ~cards.text~ ~cards.ifplural(cards|card)~-- Oh wait, sorry, wrong game.
A pair plus a triple. What was it called again? Think, Téa, think!
(Don't get too excited. They'll know your hand.)
Haha... alright, easy now.
Yes! A few years later and I still got it!
A perfect hand! Just like I planned.
If I'm this good already, I might as well make poker my main game!
You look pretty nervous, ~player~. Afraid I'm gonna stomp you or something?
The heart of the cards is speaking to me. Now there's no way I'll lose!
Don't count me out yet!
Wow, I couldn't have asked for a better hand!
Did I draw the card I need? ...ah!
Yes! Good thing I spent so many hours watching Yugi and Joey duel!
Hey, wouldn't it be cool if we played on one of those holographic fields?
So what's the story behind this game? Did ancient civilizations play it?
Not bad, but I should do better than this.
Not bad, especially since I just started.
Hmm, I can work with this.
This will have to do for now.
Alright, now I just have to bet on the others getting a worse hand.
Eh, I've seen worse.
Will this be enough?
Not terrible, but part of me isn't too sure...
I end my turn. Your move!
Hm, if only there was a fusion mechanic where I can add numbers together. Though I guess that would be too OP.
Ugh... I knew I should have swapped out a different card...
(Okay, gotta think. What would Yugi do with a hand like this?)
Maybe there's a pattern to avoiding bad hands?
Not good...
What the hell? These cards are awful!
This is bad...
I mean, one mistake doesn't cost me the game, right?
Uhh... I play infinite hands to increase my hand size!
Yep, I blew this one.
(What will I do? With my 2-0 record, everyone will think I'm a pretender...)
Not good, not good, not good!
Hey, is anyone else in a rut or just me?
Man, poker is a lot harder than I thought.
Maybe I should stick to Duel Monsters... and Dungeon Dice as well.
It would be pretty helpful if we could use our own decks.
I can't explain why, but even though I'm backed in a corner, I feel incredibly calm...
You see that duel disk Chazz is wearing? It's probably the closest thing we've got to weapons in my city.
Long, fluffy ears? Hey, that sounds like the mascot Pegasus likes! You know, Pegasus? He supposedly created Duel Monsters.
Long, fluffy ears? I don't know many Pokemon but that sounds like a monster card called Dino Rabbit.
Why don't you ask DMG?
DMG and I have been working together for a while now. I kinda wish I were playing with her instead of against her though.
(May? In a... swimsuit? Is she for real?)
Wait, you mean it? Alright, I promise I won't gawk.
You know, I bet even you could beat Chazz here, Futaba.
Yeah, when you're not being a pain!
Phew, looks like I'm winning this round.
When we went back in time with the Pharoah, I met this magician girl named Mana. She seems to resemble the Dark Magician Girl
I know jack about history, but I bet the Millenium Items had something to do with it
I think it had to do with the ancient Egyptians and the Millenium Items. They could do things like see what normal eyes can't.
Whatever you do, you better not use the Millenium Rod for you-know-what.
I bet the Millenium Puzzle reveals a super horny Yami form.
Huh? Well, everyone just fights by playing Duel Monsters. I never really thought about having a weapon.
I'm not wearing it now, but my duel disk is probably the closest thing to a weapon.
I've never seen a dance like that before. What do you even call it?
Looks more chill than ballet. Maybe I should try it too...
H-hey! You can't just leave in the middle of a duel!
Hey wait! Are you forfeiting already!?
What do you mean "season"? Were you some kind of TV star or something?
Season? Crunchyroll? What's that supposed to mean?
Season? What, it's not like we're cartoon characters with a huge fanbase, right?
I'm sure you know him. His name is Seto Kaiba, and he's so obsessed with trying to beat Yugi.
Seto Kaiba, once the world champion until Yugi beat him. Now he's obsessed with their little rivalry.
Seto Kaiba. He was so obsessed with beating Yugi that he was willing to hurt himself and play with his emotions. What an asshole.
It's gotta be something good I can dance to. Something like EDM?
Lately I've been into Jpop. Every song has a dance to it and I can't help but join in.
Well, it's a Dark Magician Girl deck of course. Yugi helped me put it together.
It's a deck full of all the cards I put together while traveling. Dark Magicin Girl is my ace of course.
Hm, don't you wanna be in Smash some day, DMG?
This outfit is what I wore during the big Battle City tournament, so I guess it's what people began to associate with me.
I have a pink vest which I wore to Duelist Kingdom. I long outgrew it but it's nostalgic.
There's one outfit I love; a yellow top and ripped shorts. Works best when I tie my hair back though.
My birthday is in August so that would make me a Leo, wouldn't it?
Couldn't tell you. I never really followed astrology.
Like star chips? Then again, we're not really in a tournament.
As long as it isn't anything too valuable, like a rare card.
Yugi always taught us effective ways to combine our cards to make the most efficient strategy. Could that skew the probability in our favor?
Duel Monsters is a little different from the computer games you like, Futaba. Everything relies on your thinking.
Duel Monsters is best played using holograms so the monsters come to life. Cool, right?
Time for a miracle! What did Yuno call it again? The hands of chance?
Hands of chance, heart of the cards, whatever! I'm in it to win it!
See? It's not so bad. If I can figure it out, you can too!
Yuno, watch it!
You didn't even try, did you?
Wait, but I thought Time Wizard was a 1/3 chance. Then again it sure has been a while since Joey played it...
Yeah, you're right, Yuno! I gotta believe just like my friends did... or something like that!
If card games are what you're looking for then I'm your girl.
Come to the game store in Domino City some time. My friend Yugi is great at this stuff.
Hey, DMG-- Sorry, would you mind if I called you DMG? It's easier that way.
You would not believe the games I had to take part in. Augmented reality, sleep pods, deckmasters, I'm lucky I got out without a scratch.
It's freezing! My legs are numb!
Where's the dance game? Every good arcade has one of those!
At least that cheater Johnny Steps is nowhere to be found.
We gotta come here more often! It's the best place for card games!
It's times like this when I should have brought my dueling disk.
Why does this place remind me of Duelist Kingdom? Must be how big everything is.
Did you make sure the cards were waterproof before setting up?
People have joked about how we don't know what Duel Monster cards are made of, but these cards can't be nearly as strong.
These cards are made out of cardboard! Whouldn't they get soggy here?
Alright, I'm starting to get the hang of this!
I've got it now. It's just like with Duel Monsters. Just needed to get my feet wet a bit.
You know, this game is much easier than I thought! It's nowhere near as complicated as Duel Monsters.
Okay, I just have to go for the pairs.
Okay, I shouldn't shoot for any of those big hands. I'll play safer.
So I should prioritize the high numbers? Oh yeah, just like in Duel Monsters. The higher numbers are always better.
This is it! My last stand begins now! With my friends believing in me, I will believe in the cards too!
If there's any time for a miracle, now is that time!
Just a little more and I win!
Hey, I might actually win! Even I'm surprised!
C'mon, DMG, help me out like you did when we dueled that penguin guy!
Yep, that's me. Right back at you, May.
Hey! You were totally bluffing!
You mean it was a trick!? Oh I'll get you for this!
Who, me? I've mostly been dancing or visiting the arcade. Still love a good card game every now and then, though.
Ever since the gang and I came back from Egypt I've been focusing more on dancing. It also gives me a chance to visit the arcade with its dance game.
I'm losing all control...
Yugi, Joey, Mai, where are you?
This can't be happening. This is just plain horrible!
The deck! It's sensing my doubt! I don't know if I can do this...
Well, I see you guys are tough. But you're not tough enough to scare me away!
Alright, I'm gonna take my bra off. I'm just... not sure how I can compare to you, ~idol~.
(With ~idol~ here, she's sure to take some attention away from me.)
Oh geez, we've really gotten to this point?
Wait, give me some time to prepare first...
No biggie. Gotta start somewhere.
So much for a perfect win.
My turn now. I wasn't really expecting to go perfect.
My turn now. I was hoping it would be a little bit challenging.
Well, so far, I'm finding this to be much less complicated than Duel Monsters.
Not bad, but we're just getting started!
Ah, just a minor setback. I'm just getting warmed up.
Oh, so I gotta go now? Alright, but don't expect me to take off something big. I'm doing my shoes first.
Well, this is it. I was hoping to have more of a buildup, but here we go.

*heavy breathing*
Alright, I'm ready. Let's do this.
Minor setback. I can't let up now.
Hmm, I'm winning, but with how luck based this game has been, I wonder how long it will last.
So far it's been a pretty easy game. Either I'm just really lucky today or we should have picked something more difficult to play.
Can't win them all, right?
Alright, I see. Can't end it yet.
Dealer, if you're rigging the deck to make this happen, you could have just asked.
Good play, but it'll take a lot more than that to psych me out!
Ohh, this isn't over yet!
Not my day, huh?
Alright, what next? I'll do my vest I suppose.
I can't catch a break can I?
Down to my last legs. But I won't stop here. You'll see!
I take back everything I said about this game being easy.
Me? But I thought I was doing fine!
I'll make a comeback soon, wait and see!
No, wait! Lemme get ready first!
Oh no!
What is going on?
Don't think I'm giving up just yet!
Talk about a rough first impression.
Man, what a bummer.
Maybe I'm just not cut out for poker.
Yeah, I'm not liking this. Duel Monsters and Dungeon Dice aren't nearly this luck based.
Is it too late to choose another game?
Damn it, I still have much to learn.
Are you doing something to the deck, dealer?
You see that? This is way too luck based!
You see that? This is like if you keep drawing Kuriboh every turn!
Well, you got me good May. Guess I can join you now!

Huh? My friendship circle! I forgot I drew that.
"Believe in yourself, Téa. We're right here with you!"
Have you heard of the duelist Mai Valentine? She saw me naked while we were at Duelist Kingdom.
Hey, I've got another idea. Why don't we set up our favorite card as a deckmaster?
Whatever, it's just a game in the end.
In retrospect, I wasn't doing so well when I first learned Duel Monsters, either. Guess it's part of that card game cycle.
Although, now that I think about it, I would have done even worse in my first Duel Monsters game if Mai didn't surrender.
Though now that I mention it, I can't think of many other games that work well with stripping.
Okay, I've actually been pretty nervous about getting this far... but I can handle it!
Could you please not stare? It would make this easier.
You know, I actually just came back from studying abroad in America. It feels nice to be playing card games in familiar territory again.
This isnt a life-or-death situation so I dont feel nearly as tense.
At the very least, I'm glad there's no shadow realm gimmicks or evil spirits to deal with.
Before anyone asks, I don't have any cards in my pockets.
I gotta remember to not tighten my belt so much.
I guess there're not much to worry about now.
I forgot my undershirt before coming here so I'll go straight to my tank top.
Normally I have an undershirt which is easier to dance in, but I forgot to bring it today.
No need to worry. This is what the game's all about!
Okay, I'm ready. Are you guys ready too?
You know what? You've all been good sports today, so I'll give you a little treat!
We'll see about that, May!
Not until I win this game, May! Maybe after the game though...
Y-yeah, real funny, Chazz! You Duel Academy students are hysterical!
Thanks for sticking it out with me, May. If I was going to show my boobs to anyone, I'm glad it's you.
Then again, I don't usually visit the Inventory that much, so it's not that familiar.
Then again, I never expected I'd be in a classroom again.
Still, I wish I wasn't exactly reminded of our high school days.
Still, I would have preferred not playing in school again...
It's somewhat nostalgic, seeing Yugi and Joey hanging out on the school roof.
Oh man, I'm so ready to take a dip after this.
They're right. I've got to believe in the cards, just like my friends believe in me!
Then again, what kind of deck abilities are there in poker?
No, wait, never mind. That would never work.
So I figured, if I have no problem with her, then I'd be cool with you guys too.
Alright, I'm nearly finished.
Alright, I made it. Now there's nothing to hide.
Compared to those things, stripping nude is a beginner's move.
Well in that case, I just have to play as hard as I can right now! No backing out.
Must have worked out though, as it was enough for me to get invited to Kaiba's Duel Links world.
But I was able to get Yugi's confidence back, so that's a win too in my book.
W-well, there you go. Do you like it?
Do you like it at least, ~player~?
I'm not just gonna cover them up like a scared little girl, though. I've got nothing to hide!
Maybe I should work out more...
Would have been nice to play at the beach. Oh well, maybe next time.

Playtime is now over! The gloves are off and I'm getting serious!
(That was so cool! I've always wanted to say those things.)
I'm still aiming to do well, though! After all, it's no fun if I'm getting destroyed out here!
I won't let this break me, though!
This round I'll do much better! There's no point in making mistakes if I don't learn from them!
I hope I'm not being too competitive. I guess I tend to do that, even for a new game.
There we go. My shoes are off, so this is when I start getting serious!
And there you go!
Though I don't see why you aren't just satisfied with my boobs. Those are what always stand out.
Heh, haha! Chazz is in trouble! Chazz is in trouble!
Looks like the Chazz is losing his pizazz! *chuckle*
So what is Uno, anyway? Did Kaibacorp make it?
So what is Uno, anyway? Is it another one of those ancient Egyptian card games?
Talk about a Catastrophe!
(It almost feels wrong hearing DMG refer to herself as a monster, even if she is a monster card...)
Don't hold back now.
We've gotten this far, now you have to go big.
Don't you boys have much less to take off? I'll be through with you in an instant!
Okay, now we're going somewhere.
You lose, ~name~!
(Wait a minute, what will I do once they get to their crotch...?)
Oh, another round is done?
W-wait? Already? But I'm not done yet!
Are you taking this seriously? I don't have time to be fooling around.
Yeah! I'm in the groove!
Woohoo!
Hey, ~target~? Earth to ~target~? It's your turn!
Well? What are you waiting for?
That's how we do it, yeah!
Your turn, ~target~!
Nope, still in it!
Haha, sucks to be you, ~target~
See that? I'm no pushover!
Ooh, that's gotta stink!
Ooh, that looked painful!
Didn't Mai have a spell card that gives her Harpie Lady a whip? I never saw it as anything dirty.
Wow, who would have seen that coming?
Did anyone else get that?
So that's your strategy!
I activate the trap card Waboku! Your newly summoned monster can't do damage this turn!
You know, Miku, I don't remember if they have your games at the arcade. The game I beat Johnny Steps in didn't have a mascot, so it couldn't have been yours.
Can you even hear us with those headphones on?
Just remember, it's only a game. Nothing too serious.
Now I see why you're the ultimate gamer.
W-wait, you think I'm cute!?
Ehehe, must have been fate bringing us together.
Seems like you've got something to hide, Kyoko. If it's your strategy, I bet I'll figure it out!
I see we have a cheeky one here today. Well then, allow me to toss in some humble pie.
Let's see if you can solve the case of me kicking your ass!
Hm, you're sort of quiet... that's spooky...
C'mon! Don't look so depressed!
I promised a comeback, and it looks like you're gonna get it!
You've activated my trap card! It makes you have to strip off another piece of clothing!
Woah, that was a close one...
Hey, not bad!
Wow, that was impressive!
I didn't even do any practice rounds!
Haha! I hope you take me seriously now!
You lose, ~name~!
Okay, now we're going somewhere.
~target~, we're right here with you! You can do this!
Oh, another round is done?
Are you taking this seriously? I don't have time to be fooling around.
Yeah! I'm in the groove!
Woohoo!
Hey, ~target~? Earth to ~target~? It's your turn!
Well? What are you waiting for?
That's how we do it, yeah!
Your turn, ~target~!
Nope, still in it!
Haha, sucks to be you, ~target~
See that? I'm no pushover!
Ooh, that's gotta stink!
Ooh, that looked painful!
Don't hold back now.
We've gotten this far, now you have to go big.
I never would have imagined this game would have ties.
That was close. Next time I won't be so lucky!
Wait, what happens now?
A tie? Great, this will take even longer now!
What happened? Did someone tie?
Oh, come on! You should have taken that off first!
Wait, really? Then why would you expose yourself so early?
You mean you wanted us to see your... thing this whole time? I don't get it.
(Guess I got a lot more time to think...)
Well, surely you can do better than that!
Are you even taking this seriously?
Hahaha, wow that's lame!
About time. I was thinking you'd never get rid of your ~clothing~.
I can't believe you're trying to tease me!
Was this your strategy all along?
Hilarious, ~name~.
Yeah, enjoy this while you can, but I'm not out yet!
You barely look any different without your ~clothing~.
Hmm... what should my next move be?
Oh, so it's like a fusion summon? Or the effects of Time Wizard?
Oh great, another duelist trying to screw the rules.
I knew it! There are spirits in the cards!
Ok, so it wasn't a Duel Monsters card. Then what the heck are you?
I see how it is. Making me work a little bit harder to bring you down. Well that won't stop me!
Amazing. No matter what she takes off, she does it with immense star power.
I mean, we did just start, so I can't rip you for taking it slow...
Well, surely you can do better than that!
Normally I like to power up on my cards throughout the game using spells and effects. The limited card use here does put a pin in that.
Stop stalling already!
If you think that will taunt me it's not working!
Waiting for someone's turn to end in Duel Monsters is one thing, but here, it doesn't even feel like the game is progressing!
Wow, you're actually thinking of what to do next.
Boring! Come on, ~name~!
Aw man, I was hoping you would show me a little mercy...
Hmm, guess we can call it the clothes graveyard.
Huh? W-well I mean, that was pretty out of nowhere but, sure. I suppose I'll help.
(So far I don't quite see what all the hubbub is about.)
But that's what it's all about! The best way to win is to adapt to whatever challenge is thrown at you!
Hmm... what should my next move be?
Next round, then! I won't make the same mistake twice!
That ends your turn, right?
Yeah, enjoy this while you can, but I'm not out yet!
Is that all? Then let's move on!
Don't you try any dirty tricks now! You won't stay ahead for long.
You should take off something bigger next time.
Was this your strategy all along?
Yeah, I get it, showboating while I'm already out.
Excited, are we?
Hey, you could be losing worse!
Ready to lose more, ~name~?
We're not done yet!
Why don't you show us a bit more, ~name~?
Took you long enough.
Your loss is my win!
Yeah! That's what I like to see!
Don't think you've won just yet!
I mean, at this point, you don't exactly need to show the rest...
Alright! Now we're getting somewhere.
Don't feel bad. I've lost worse... way worse...
Another piece for the graveyard it seems.
Yeah! Now you're getting me excited!
Okay, this is getting a little sexy.
Why don't you show us a bit more, ~name~?
Seems like we haven't lost direction yet!
Are you okay!
Rin! Oh no!
Gyaah!
You're lucky there's no trap card that would make you strip again!
Your loss is my win!
Yeah! That's what I like to see!
How about another piece? Pretty please?
(~name~ sure knows what she's doing. I'll have to watch for what she's planning.)
You know, I kinda miss that explosive feeling when a holographic monster is destroyed, but this will do.
So, what's next?
Hey, you're gonna have to take off more sooner or later!
You're doing fine! Certainly better than me!
Oh, wow... really puts into perspective how far we've come.
Uh huh...
O-oh, okay, I see how it is.
Where are you gonna put your ~clothing~? Don't get it dirty now.
Oh wow, he's almost caught up...
Um, sorry, I don't mean to stare!
Mmm... nice... um, I mean, nice play.
Don't give up on us now.
I never would have expected superpowers to work like that.
Hurry up, ~target~, it's freezing!
Oh? Are we ready to go big now? Well then, ~name~, your move!
Now that you're worn down, I'll finish you off quickly!
We're neck and neck! Don't make any dumb decisions now!
Even though I'm out, this is making for a nice treat!
Is it, now? I guess I can see where you're coming from.
This will do just fine!
Doesn't matter what you take off, as long as you stay far behind me!
I hate to admit it, but you're cute, ~name~.
(~name~ is so cute... is it normal for me to think that?)
And to think I was fine with just star chips as a reward until now.
Go slow. I want to savor this.
We're still doing this, aren't we?
R-really? I mean, it's not like we haven't seen a man's chest before!
You really wanna go there, huh?
I-it's alright, right? Just like a day at the beach, haha!
It's your time to shine, !~Name~. Don't blow it!
Dueling shirtless doesn't seem so farfetched. We have a player named Mako Tsunami who placed top 3 in the region, yet he never duels with his shirt.
Dueling shirtless doesn't seem so farfetched. If I remember correctly, there's plenty of shirtless monster cards out there.
I don't see any of those Millenium items around. Must be your imagination.
Strange, I don't see any Millenium items. But then, who could have done this?
Uh... yeah, next turn!
You look, uh, nice.
Seems like you're running out of options, ~name~!
Would you find it weird to say "nice chest"? I know I would but everyone's different.
W-well, it's nice. Yeah, I like it. That's all I'll say.
(He's really about to show it!)
(Maybe I should have asked Yugi or Joey to show... no, what am I thinking!? I couldn't ask them!)
Moment of truth. You better not dissapoint, ~name~.
Geez, Chazz! Ever hear of too much information?
Huh, where is it? Oh, it's barely visible.
Hahaha, it's a little kuriboh! ...I'm sorry, that was uncalled for... haha!
Now that's a Little D if I've ever seen one.
Well if it's that small, I have no problem with you sticking it in me... n-not that I want that, of course!
I can't say why, but I feel somewhat powerful being clothed while ~target~'s dick is out. Must have been all the harrassment from school.
I gotta hand it to you, ~name~. You're making it very tough for me to focus!
Good, ~target~, you know what's needed around here.
(Okay, now I've seen everything.)
Ew, that's just gross...
(Don't let it distract you. Focus on the game.)
Oh man, talk about a sword of revealing light...
W-whoa. Nice.
That thing could tear anyone apart in a heartbeat...
I don't know how I'm doing it, but if you're at your boobs already, I'll take it!
(Wow, she's actually doing it.)
Go on... we're waiting...
To the victor go the spoils!
Excited, are we?
C'mon, ~name~, it's only fair!
Cmon, ~name~, I'm showing mine, so you gotta as well!
Do we finally get to see ~name~ topless?
